description:
The Dorssian Army`s prized strategic weapons. Its maneuverability in both space and in the air belie its large size, and its combat capabilities surpass all existing weapons concepts. They are leaps and bounds ahead of any other country. Multiple variations exist, tailored to specific ace pilots or commanders.
Source: aniplexusa.com
name: Er114 Ideal-kyuu Kidou Senmetsu Ki
